text: The Thomas W. Phillips Memorial is a historic building in Nashville, Tennessee, U.S.. It is home to the Disciples of Christ Historical Society, and it is near the campus of Vanderbilt University. It was built in 1956. It has been listed on the National Register of Historic Places since November 9, 2006. ==References== Category:Properties of religious function on the National Register of Historic Places in Tennessee Category:Gothic Revival architecture in Tennessee Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1956 Category:Buildings and structures in Nashville, Tennessee
title: Thomas W. Phillips Memorial
